Pertussis (Test Panels for Bordetella pertussis and Bordetella parapertussis Nucleic Acid and Culture and Identification Method)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    41875-6 Bordetella pertussis and Bordetella parapertussis DNA panel - Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    62426-2 Bordetella sp DNA panel - Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    78921-4 Bordetella pertussis and Bordetella parapertussis DNA and culture panel - Nasopharynx
    85809-2 Bordetella pertussis and parapertussis and holmesii DNA panel - Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
